1016.name: mega-venusaur
flavor_text: In order to support its flower, which has grown larger due to Mega Evolution, its back and legs have become stronger.
The flower on its back has grown even larger due to Mega Evolution. The weight of the flower has made it difficult for it to move.
The flower on its back has grown even larger due to Mega Evolution. The weight of the flower has made it difficult for it to move.
1016.description: In order to support its flower, which has grown larger due to Mega Evolution, its back and legs have become stronger.

1017.name: mega-charizard-x
flavor_text: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.
When this Pokémon Mega Evolves, its body turns black and its eyes turn blue. It becomes even more aggressive.
The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.
1017.description: The overwhelming power that fills its entire body causes it to turn black and creates intense blue flames.

1018.name: mega-charizard-y
flavor_text: Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.
When this Pokémon Mega Evolves, its wings become larger and it gains the ability to create intense heat.
Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.
1018.description: Its bond with its Trainer is the source of its power. It boasts speed and maneuverability greater than that of a jet fighter.

1019.name: mega-blastoise
flavor_text: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
When this Pokémon Mega Evolves, it gains additional cannons on its shell that can fire powerful water jets.
The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
1019.description: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

1020.name: mega-alakazam
flavor_text: It is said to have an IQ of 5000. It can outperform a supercomputer in terms of calculation power.
1020.description: It is said to have an IQ of 5000. It can outperform a supercomputer in terms of calculation power.

1021.name: mega-gengar
flavor_text: It can pass through other dimensions and appear anywhere. It causes a chill to run down your spine.
1021.description: It can pass through other dimensions and appear anywhere. It causes a chill to run down your spine.

1022.name: mega-kangaskhan
flavor_text: The child in its pouch leaves home after roughly three years. That is the only time the mother is heard to cry wildly.
1022.description: The child in its pouch leaves home after roughly three years. That is the only time the mother is heard to cry wildly.

1023.name: mega-pinsir
flavor_text: It swings its long pincers wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.
1023.description: It swings its long pincers wildly to attack. During cold periods, it hides deep in forests.

1024.name: mega-gyarados
flavor_text: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.
1024.description: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

1025.name: mega-aerodactyl
flavor_text: A ferocious, prehistoric Pokémon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.
1025.description: A ferocious, prehistoric Pokémon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

1026.name: mega-mewtwo-x
flavor_text: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.
1026.description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

1027.name: mega-mewtwo-y
flavor_text: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.
1027.description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

1028.name: mega-ampharos
flavor_text: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
1028.description: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

1029.name: mega-steelix
flavor_text: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.
1029.description: It is thought its body transformed as a result of iron accumulating internally from swallowing soil.

1030.name: mega-scizor
flavor_text: It raises its pincers with eyelike markings for intimidation. It also swings them down dangerously.
1030.description: It raises its pincers with eyelike markings for intimidation. It also swings them down dangerously.

1031.name: mega-heracross
flavor_text: With its Herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.
1031.description: With its Herculean powers, it can easily throw around an object that is 100 times its own weight.

1032.name: mega-houndoom
flavor_text: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.
1032.description: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.

1033.name: mega-tyranitar
flavor_text: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.
1033.description: Its body can't be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

1034.name: mega-sceptile
flavor_text: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.
1034.description: It agilely leaps about the jungle and uses the sharp leaves on its arms to strike its prey.

1035.name: mega-blaziken
flavor_text: It can clear a 30-story building in a single leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.
1035.description: It can clear a 30-story building in a single leap. Its fiery punches scorch its foes.

1036.name: mega-swampert
flavor_text: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.
1036.description: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

1037.name: mega-gardevoir
flavor_text: It will give its life to protect its Trainer. It can sense emotions with the horns on its head.
1037.description: It will give its life to protect its Trainer. It can sense emotions with the horns on its head.

1038.name: mega-sableye
flavor_text: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food—raw gems.
1038.description: It digs branching holes in caves using its sharp claws in search of food—raw gems.

1039.name: mega-mawile
flavor_text: It has a docile nature. It raises its big ears only when it is trying to appear intimidating.
1039.description: It has a docile nature. It raises its big ears only when it is trying to appear intimidating.

1040.name: mega-aggron
flavor_text: It claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly thrashes anything that violates its environment.
1040.description: It claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly thrashes anything that violates its environment.

1041.name: mega-medicham
flavor_text: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its body has also become more supple.
1041.description: Through yoga training, it has honed its sixth sense. Its body has also become more supple.

1042.name: mega-manectric
flavor_text: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.
1042.description: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates a thundercloud overhead to drop lightning bolts.

1043.name: mega-sharpedo
flavor_text: Nicknamed 'the bully of the sea,' it is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off.
1043.description: Nicknamed 'the bully of the sea,' it is widely feared. Its cruel fangs grow back immediately if they snap off.

1044.name: mega-camerupt
flavor_text: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts with an explosion.
1044.description: It has volcanoes on its back. If magma builds up in its body, it shudders, then erupts with an explosion.

1045.name: mega-altaria
flavor_text: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.
1045.description: It flies gracefully through the sky. Its melodic humming makes you feel like you're in a dream.

1046.name: mega-banette
flavor_text: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.
1046.description: A doll that became a Pokémon over its grudge from being junked. It seeks the child that disowned it.

1047.name: mega-absol
flavor_text: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.
1047.description: It appears when it senses an impending natural disaster. As a result, it was mistaken as a doom bringer.

1048.name: mega-glalie
flavor_text: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.
1048.description: It can instantly freeze moisture in the atmosphere. It uses this power to freeze its foes.

1049.name: mega-salamence
flavor_text: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.
1049.description: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with shredding claws and fire.

1050.name: mega-metagross
flavor_text: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its four brains are joined by a complex neural network.
1050.description: It is formed by two Beldum joining together. Its four brains are joined by a complex neural network.

1051.name: mega-latias
flavor_text: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in a down that can refract light to make it invisible.
1051.description: It communicates using telepathy. Its body is covered in a down that can refract light to make it invisible.

1052.name: mega-latios
flavor_text: It has a docile temperament. It dislikes fighting, so it protects itself by teleporting away when it senses danger.
1052.description: It has a docile temperament. It dislikes fighting, so it protects itself by teleporting away when it senses danger.

1053.name: mega-rayquaza
flavor_text: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.
1053.description: It flies forever through the ozone layer, consuming meteoroids for sustenance. The many meteoroids in its body provide the energy it needs to Mega Evolve.

1054.name: mega-lopunny
flavor_text: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.
1054.description: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.

1055.name: mega-lucario
flavor_text: It has the ability to sense the emotions of people. It protects those it likes and never lets them out of its sight.
1055.description: It has the ability to sense the emotions of people. It protects those it likes and never lets them out of its sight.

1056.name: mega-abomasnow
flavor_text: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.
1056.description: It lives a quiet life on mountains that are perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself by whipping up blizzards.

1057.name: mega-gallade
flavor_text: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.
1057.description: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

1058.name: mega-audino
flavor_text: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.
1058.description: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

1059.name: mega-diancie
flavor_text: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
1059.description: A sudden transformation of Carbink, its pink, glimmering body is said to be the loveliest sight in the whole world.
